code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from"react";import{FullScreen}from"ol/control";import MapContext from"../Map/MapContext";var FullScreenControl=function FullScreenControl(){var _useContext=useContext(MapContext),map=_useContext.map;useEffect(function(){if(!map)return;var fullScreenControl=new FullScreen({});map.controls.push(fullScreenControl);return function(){return map.controls.remove(fullScreenControl);};},[map]);return null;};export default FullScreenControl;
